thread.title: Rosie O'Donnell Settles Divorce With Ex-Wife Michelle Rounds
thread.title_full: Rosie O'Donnell Settles Divorce With Ex-Wife Michelle Rounds

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Rosie O'Donnell Settles Divorce With Ex-Wife Michelle Rounds
text:
Comments Both the former 'The View' host and her IT consultant ex-wife left the Manhattan Supreme Court with smiles on their faces. 
No more court battle between Rosie O'Donnell and ex-wife Michelle Rounds. The former couple has reached a settlement after eight months battling it out in court, exiting the Manhattan Supreme Court on Wednesday, October 21 with smiles on their faces. "There's peace in the Middle East. It's done. We've settled. We're both very happy about the outcome," O'Donnell told reporters. Rounds' attorney William London revealed both parties agreed to "joint legal custody" of their adopted 2-year-old daughter, Dakota. "We're happy with everything," London said. "It's over." A smiling Rounds expressed her joy, saying, "I feel great". According to PageSix.com, O'Donnell and Rounds chatted amicably after three hours of negotiations. London was overheard telling his client, "Don't ask for the world. Be reasonable." O'Donnell filed for divorce from Rounds in February after more than two years of marriage. The former couple had thrown in a series of nasty accusations at each other during the trials. Rounds was hospitalized in September for a reported suicide attempt.
